ygData.subject: Re: Camping, a solution
ygData.msgSnippet: Your completely right... I didnt see this flaw in my plan till you mentioned it.  There have been some truly unique and viable solution posted about this thead
ygData.messageBody:
Your completely right... I didnt see this flaw in my plan till you mentioned
it. There have been some truly unique and viable solution posted about this
thead so far. Hope someone is keeping a whole archive of this particualr
thread

Dyvim Kincaid
Stormriders of Cazic Thule

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Mifsud, Michael [mailto:Michael.Mifsud@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 10:55 PM
> To: 'warriors_eq@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Camping, a solution
>
>
> From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
>
> I see your point but I disagree. I think it should be TOTALLY
> random unless
> a quest is attached to that item. So the executioner axe is on a level 45
> mob in a dungeon. That means the executioner axe could appear on
> ANY level
> 45 mob in the game (within reason, necromancers wielding it in Najena
> doesn't make sense). Probably add the restriction that it also must be a
> dungeon mob.
>
> The only reason I dont like your idea is simply, people will camp at all 4
> spots. People WILL spend obscene amounts of time trying to get that item.
> For a solid week easy I saw the same people over and over again
> waiting for
> the Tomahawks.
>
> I think your solution just spreads camping. There are people with lots of
> time, people WILL spend days at a spot waiting for an item if
> they know that
> SOMETIME the item WILL appear here then it WILL be camped.
>
> > ----------
> > From: James Wofford[SMTP:James.Wofford@...]
> > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Sent: Wednesday, May 26, 1999 5:41 AM
> > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Camping, a solution
> >
> > From: James Wofford <James.Wofford@...>
> >
> > You bring up a valid point. But the reason for random spawn is to make
> > the
> > game more enjoyable to people as a whole. Also, the spawn would have to
> > be
> > completely random in time. I Just think the spawn should be on
> maybe 3 or
> > 4
> > different types of mobs, all around the same level, all
> spawning in 3 or 4
> > different zones, and all spawning at different random intervals. This
> > increases the chances the items will be around, and makes it a
> little more
> > difficult to camp it. Also, there should be more of a chance that the
> > item
> > is not actually on the mob since there will be more appearing
> more often.
> >
> > For instance, you want a rubicite breastplate. For those of us who know
> > what and where it comes from, its pretty easy to wait for the spawn to
> > appear. Then get together poeple and whack it. (dont get me wrong, its
> > not
> > an easy task to kill... just to wait for it.) On the other hand, if that
> > same creature spawned in 3 or 4 different zones, and only spawned at
> > random
> > intervals... The campers would either have to spend obscene amounts of
> > time
> > sitting on one area hopping to get lucky. Or they would just have to
> > travel
> > back and forth to the 3 or 4 different zones to get their kill.
> This also
> > increases the chance that the spawn will appear when they just left the
> > zone
> > they were waiting in and give someone else a chance at it.
> >
> >
